titles.title: Renewable Hydrogen Passenger Vehicle Act of 2005

A bill to amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to provide for a program to develop and demonstrate the cost-effective operation of a fleet of renewable hydrogen passenger vehicles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 2/14/2005--Introduced. Renewable Hydrogen Passenger Vehicle Act of 2005 - Amends the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to direct the Secretary of Energy, in coordination with the Secretary of Agriculture, to conduct a three-year program to develop and demonstrate the cost-effective operation of a fleet of at least ten direct hydrogen passenger vehicles based on existing commercial technology under which the hydrogen is derived from ethanol or other domestic low-cost transportable renewable feedstocks.
